TextBody:
Hello Matt,
I’m Ramon from Netwrix Technical Support, and I’ve been assigned to your case. I want to clarify that our hosted solution is deployed on Amazon Web Services (AWS), rather than Microsoft Azure.

From a technical perspective, the only difference is that the server is hosted by us, so you only need to have the agents installed on the machines. They also need to have internet connection in order to communicate with the server.

I am adding my colleague Julia to the thread, for other details from a commercial perspective.

Thank you.

Best Regards, 
Ramon Torres | Technical Support Engineer
ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0OD7vb:ref
Subject: Walk Through of Azure Hosted Solution    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0OD7vb:ref ]

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000OD7vb:ref

Thank you for your e-mail.
Please be informed that I will be out of the office and I will return on 24 of April, 2025. If you have an urgent matter that cannot wait until my return to the office, please send an email to admin@tss-yonder.com.

Kind regards,
Cristian Pojar-Persecan
M +40 756 113 049
Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #442546 - ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000OD7vb:ref - Automatic reply: [EXT] - Walk Through of Azure Hosted Solution    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0OD7vb:ref ]

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000OD7vb:ref

Hi Matt,

From a commercial perspective, you are currently spending $62,058 annually. Migrating to Saas would bring that cost up to $77,573 annually.

Please let us know if you have any other questions from a technical or commercial perspective.

Thank you.

Subject: Walk Through of Azure Hosted Solution [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0OD7vb:ref ]
Hello Matt,

I’m Ramon from Netwrix Technical Support, and I’ve been assigned to your case. I want to clarify that our hosted solution is deployed on Amazon Web Services (AWS), rather than Microsoft Azure.

From a technical perspective, the only difference is that the server is hosted by us, so you only need to have the agents installed on the machines. They also need to have internet connection in order to communicate with the server.

I am adding my colleague Julia to the thread, for other details from a commercial perspective.

Thank you.

Best Regards,
